snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Thursday's selection includes items on jobs displaced by technology, coding as an employment skill and tech jobs with Kanye West.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Thursday's selection includes items on jobs displaced by technology, coding as an employment skill and tech jobs with Kanye West.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Vanishing Jobs and the Need for Coders
